features.title: Dial
features.description:
- 3 counters with “azurage”:

  • Hour chronograph counter at 6 o’clock
  • Minute chronograph counter at 9 o’clock
  • Running second counter at 3 o’clock

 

- Hand-applied polished faceted indexes with luminescent markers

- Polished counter’s hands

features.title: Case
features.description:
- Fine-brushed and polished unidirectional turning bezel in steel:

  • Engraved numbers
  • SLN dot at 12 o’clock
  • Large polished chamfer

 

- Anti-reflective scratch-resistant sapphire crystal

- Polished steel screw-in crown

- Polished steel push-buttons

- Fine-brushed screw-in caseback with diving bell engraving

features.title: Bracelet
features.description:
- Fine-brushed and polished “H-shape” steel bracelet

- Fine-brushed steel folding clasp with safety push-buttons and diving extension

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Calibre 9
Automatic Watch
28MM
productDescription: Time in its luxury essence, with the elegant sweep of hours and minute hands. Feminine touches abound in the finishing: the polished bezel, the hand-applied, facetted and polished indexes and the exquisite dials in white mother-of-pearl or black or silver with beautiful «azurage» effect. Opulence and sobriety in perfect harmony.

- Water resistance: 100 meters

Automatic Chronograph
44 MM
productDescription: The ultimate racing look for the ultimate racing chronograph. The excitingly re-sculpted case is an impressive 44mm, and houses the powerful Calibre 16 movement. The finish of the redesigned tachymeter bezel, made of fine-brushed, polished, and sandblasted steel, is astonishing. Racing technology in motion.

label:
300M
27MM
productDescription:
The Aquaracers display the exquisite bezel shape our designers exhausted their skills to create. The bezel’s facets and studs harmonize perfectly with the eye-catching H-shaped bracelet, which is completely new to the Aquaracer Lady range. Every detail of the dial has been designed to harness the magic of harmony.

Perfect yet robust feminine harmony.

features.description:

- Date window at 3 o’clock

productDescription: In 2014, TAG Heuer unveils its most exclusive collection of TAG Heuer Carrera Lady to date. Completely renewed and delicately sized (28mm), these gorgeous new timepieces are fully polished for a very feminine allure. They are powered by a Calibre 9, which is discreetly housed in steel. A must-have accessory and an icon of contemporary femininity.

label:
Calibre 16
Automatic Chronograph
43 MM
productDescription: A spectacular timepiece of true elegance. Features of the Calibre 16 chronograph include: the cushion-shaped bezel with its tachymeter scale; the oversized running seconds counter at 9; scratch-resistant sapphire crystal with double anti-reflective treatment; a screw-fitting case back with engraved decoration. Available in a choice of black, silver, or-in 2014 for the first time - anthracite dials. Link Calibre 16 chronograph: for people who appreciate the finest things in life.

label: 300M </br>Diamond Dial</br> 27 MM
productDescription:
The Aquaracers display the exquisite bezel shape our designers exhausted their skills to create. The bezel’s facets and studs harmonize perfectly with the eye-catching H-shaped bracelet, which is completely new to the Aquaracer Lady range. Every detail of the dial has been designed to harness the magic of harmony.

Even more special is the 27mm version ablaze with 30 diamonds on its bezel and 11 diamonds celebrating time on the dial. Perfect yet robust feminine harmony.

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Calibre 1887
Automatic Chronograph
Monaco Grand prix
43 mm
case: Sandblasted black titanium with Titanium carbide Coating
productDescription: A timepiece with instant impact. This limited edition shows Carrera at its sportiest and most daring. Its uncompromising racing looks honour TAG Heuer’s partnership with the Monaco Grand Prix, the world’s most prestigious circuit in Formula 1. Internally, our prized in-house 1887 Calibre provides record-beating performance. Externally, every design detail shouts F1 racing. Fine-brushed black titanium carbide coats the titanium case, providing durability. The magnificent impact of masculine black is mellowed by subtle striping on the dial, and flashes of blazing red on dial, hands, and ‘Monaco Grand Prix’ lettering. The strap reproduces the thrilling tread of racing car tyres. Carrera Calibre 1887 Monaco Grand Prix. A stunning limited edition.

label: Calibre 5 </br> Automatic Watch </br> 41 MM
productDescription: A unique first. The exclusive Calibre 5 movement powers this, the first TAG Heuer Formula 1 automatic timepiece. Naturally, it features all the established TAG heuer Formula 1 features, such as the case back with its classic checkered design. The unidirectional turning bezel crowns the exclusive new case shape, with its elegant, sculpted horns and choice of black or white dials. The choice is yours... but don’t delay.

label:
Calibre 18
Automatic Chronograph
40 mm
productDescription: This year TAG Heuer takes the Link in a new direction. By rethinking every contour of the Link case we have launched the supremely elegant Calibre 18 Chronograph. Everything about its fine-brushed and polished steel case is subtly, different, especially its ideal 40mm size and slimmer thickness. The cushion-shaped fixed bezel, also in fine-brushed and polished steel, gives the dial a more open look. Link Calibre 18 Chronograph. A delight for the eyes—and against your skin.

features.title: Sapphire crystal caseback
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

productDescription:
The glittering allure of diamonds - 12 Top Wesseltons (0.10 carat) - on a pure mother-of-pearl dial, and a further 56 Top Wesseltons (0.55 carat) on the fixed polished steel bezel. The luxurious sensuousness of the H-shaped steel bracelet is polished for a subtle contrast of burnished glows. On the case back, you can admire the intricate movement in action beneath
the sapphire crystal case back, beating perfect time. An elegant and timeless piece of jewelry.

43 MM
McLaren 40th anniversary
strap: Black rubber strap with embossed “tyre design”
productDescription: To pay homage to the most winning partnership in motorsports - TAG Heuer and McLaren Mercedes - the Manufacture is launching a stunning new chronograph. The in-house Calibre 1887 powers the chronograph, which has a 43mm case in polished steel, a rubber strap with a special race tire tread design, a black ceramic bezel marked with “MCLAREN 1974 EDITION,” as a tribute to the team’s 40th anniversary, and a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal caseback sports the 1974 McLaren logo. Stunning symbol of excellence.

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label: Calibre 5 </br> Automatic Watch </br> 41 mm
productDescription: Una singular primicia. En el interior del primer reloj automático TAG Heuer Formula 1 late el exclusivo movimiento Calibre 5. Naturalmente, el reloj cuenta con todas las características ya conocidas del TAG Heuer Formula 1, tales como el fondo de caja con su clásico diseño a cuadros. El bisel giratorio unidireccional corona la exclusiva nueva forma de la caja, con sus elegantes asas esculpidas y esfera negra o blanca a elegir. La elección es toda suya... pero no se lo piense demasiado.

label:

Automatic Watch
Yellow Gold Edition
40.5 MM
strap: Fine-brushed and polished Steel and Yellow Gold (18K 3N) capped
productDescription: The Aquaracer 300M is the existing testimony that sporty can be elegant. Powered by the Calibre 5 automatic movement, its exterior is completely remodeled with a bold silhouette and new luxury finishes. The geometric-edged rotating bezel on the 40.5mm case is new yet faithful to the Aquaracer design with the 6 signature studs ensuring good gripping ability. It is also alternating the same fine-brushed and polished finish as the high-end H-shaped bracelet. The horizontal streak pattern on the refreshed dial design is another standout, as is the diving bell engraving on the screwed-in case back. Water-resistant to 300 meters with a screw-in crown, and irresistible to all lovers of yachting lifestyle.

productDescription:
As rugged as Steve McQueen. As thrilling as motor racing. The distinctive Monaco shape with a new Calibre. This Monaco Calibre 6 offers uncompromising styling and a daring full black look, with its black titanium carbide coated case, black dial and sub-counter. The perforated leather strap with red detailing

adds that final touch of masculine swagger. A watch you can be proud to have on your wrist.

features.title: Black titanium carbide coated fine-brushed and polished steel case
Black titanium carbide coated polished steel crown
Faceted skeleton minute and hour hands with white luminescent markers
Polished faceted hand-applied indexes with luminescent markers
Steel folding clasp with safety push-buttons

movementDetails.label: Calibre 6
movementDetails.description:
TAG Heuer Calibre 6, Swiss Made.

Automatic calibre.

Diameter: 26 to 26.20 mm (11 ½''') - 27 to 31 rubies depending on the execution.

Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:

Power reserve: about 38 to 44 hours depending on the execution.
movementDetails.display:
Hours — minutes — small seconds at 6.

Date window.

300M
40.5 MM
productDescription: Robustly stylish, the quartz edition of the 2014 Aquaracer 300M offers new dial executions. The dial colors are blue, silver or deep black with striking contrast between the «sunray» effect on the internal part of the dial and the snailing on the external part. Its design is visually compelling. Sporty yet elegant. The hallmark of the Aquaracer timepieces.

features.description:

- Angled date window at 3 o’clock

features.title: Case
features.description:
- Unidirectional turning bezel:

  • Engraved numbers
  • SLN dot at 12 o’clock
  • Polished chamfer

 

- Scratch resistant sapphire crystal with antireflective treatment

- Polished steel screw-in crown

features.title: Bracelet
features.description: - Fine-brushed steel folding clasp with safety push-buttons and diving extension

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label: Calibre 7  GMT</BR> Automatic Watch</BR> 42 mm
productDescription: Link Calibre 7: a powerful style statement for busy professionals. The Link Calibre 7 turns practicality into style. Powered by a Calibre 7 movement, its crisp design is highlighted by the 24-hour GMT second time zone in the center of the dial. Every detail of this timepiece radiates stylishness: the 42mm case, the elegant vertical texturing on the dial, available in alternative colours, and the redesigned signature Link bracelet. A finishing touch is the sapphire crystal case back, letting you enjoy watching the ultra-precise movement in action. Travelling different time zones has never been easier.

GMT hand with red arrow tip and SLN
Hand applied monochrome TAG Heuer logo
Polished and faceted hour and minutes hands, with white luminescent markers
Scratch-resistant curved sapphire crystal with double antireflective treatment
Solid steel folding clasp with safety push-buttons

label: Calibre 1887</br>  Automatic Chronograph</br>  45 mm
case: polished, fine-brushed and sandblasted steel and titanium
bezel: Black titanium carbide coated steel fixed
productDescription:
This Carrera Calibre 1887 chronograph exudes technology and sportivity. Its avantgarde design is special for two reasons.
The imposing 45mm case has an ultra-modern steel fixed bezel sealed with a protective coating of black titanium carbide. The case surmounts an architectural structure of sandblasted steel, like a bridge supported on graceful arches. The dial with its sculpturally recessed counters shimmers with a ‘sunray’ effect at its centre. Truly unique. Truly TAG Heuer.

features.title: Black dial with sunray effect with 3 counters:
features.description:
- Chronograph minute at 9 o’clock with silver polished outlines

- Chronograph hour at 3 o’clock with silver polished outlines

- Running second at 6 o’clock

Black Titanium Grade 2 folding clasp with safety push-buttons
Polished, fine-brushed and sandblasted steel and titanium case
Polished minute and hour hands with luminescent markers
Red tip on chronograph second hand
Red tip on chronograph hour and minute hands

movementDetails.label: Calibre 1887

movementDetails.performance: Balance frequency: 28.800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz). Power reserve: about 50 hours, about 40 hours when the chronograph is engaging.

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Calibre 1887
Automatic Chronograph
45 MM
productDescription: Words cannot do justice to this sensational newcomer to the Carrera Calibre 1887 range. “Unique,” “revolutionary,” and “utterly exclusive” just begin to describe it. Its case is constructed of Carbon Matrix Composite, a special compound with aerospace applications, miraculously light yet with unbeatable resistance to wear and temperature changes. The overall design is based on the famous TAG Heuer Carrera Mikrogirder, winner of the 2012 Aiguille d’Or at the Grand Prix d’Horlogerie de Genève. Modern sculpture and next-generation technology miraculously combine to create this exceptional landmark chronograph.

features.description:

  • Chronograph minute at 9 o’clock
  • Chronograph hour at 3 o’clock
  • Running second at 6 o’clock

 

- Hand-applied arabic numerals

- Polished hour and minute hands with luminescent markers

- Red tip on chronographs hands

- Polished black gold* running second hand

- Hand-applied TAG Heuer logo

- Tachymetre scale on the flange

- “CARRERA – Cal. 1887” lettering on the dial

- Hand-applied date window at 6 o’clock

label: Calibre 7 GMT</BR> Automatic Watch</BR> 42mm
dial: Anthracite with vertical streak and sunray effect
productDescription: Link Calibre 7: a powerful style statement for busy professionals. The Link Calibre 7 turns practicality into style. Powered by a Calibre 7 movement, its crisp design is highlighted by the 24-hour GMT second time zone in the center of the dial. Every detail of this timepiece radiates stylishness: the 42mm case, the elegant vertical texturing on the dial, with rose gold-plated hands and indexes and the redesigned signature Link bracelet. A finishing touch is the sapphire crystal case back, letting you enjoy watching the ultra-precise movement in action. Travelling different time zones has never been easier.

features.title: 24H GMT second time zone in center
Fine-brushed and polished steel S-shaped LINK bracelet
Hand-applied faceted rose gold plated indexes
Rose gold plated GMT hand with SLN
Rose gold plated minute and hour hands with luminescent markers
Scratch-resistant curved sapphire crystal with double antireflective treatment
Solid steel folding clasp with safety push-buttons

TAG Heuer Calibre 7, Swiss Made.

Automatic calibre.

Diameter: 26.2 mm (11 1/2''') — 21 to 25 rubies depending on the execution.

Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:

Power reserve: about 42 to 46 hours depending on the execution.

Date window.

label:
GRANDE DATE
42mm
productDescription:
These models radiate all the excitement of F1 racing. Flanges on watch and chronograph display the racing red* of McLaren, our Formula 1 partner. And the same fiery red contrasts with white on the chronograph counters to make them superbly readable. The black titanium carbide-coated bezel* is an essential speed-measuring tool.

The watchs small second counter is embellished with a spiral effect,

highlighting the Grande Date window at 6.



*Depending on the model

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Screw-in crown with 'Easy Grip' system and double gaskets
Circular fine brushed screwed case back with special checkered decoration
Curved & polished hand-applied indexes and 12 numeral with luminescent markers
Polished minute and hour hands with luminescent markers

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
GRANDE DATE
42mm
productDescription:
These models radiate all the excitement of F1 racing. Flanges on watch and chronograph display the racing red* of McLaren, our Formula 1 partner. And the same fiery red contrasts with white on the chronograph counters to make them superbly readable. The black titanium carbide-coated bezel* is an essential speed-measuring tool.

The watchs small second counter is embellished with a spiral effect,

highlighting the Grande Date window at 6.



*Depending on the model

productDescription: Engineered with Vodafone McLaren Mercedes and tested in racing conditions by Jenson Button, each timepiece comes equipped with the TAG Heuer six key features: 1/10th of a second display, water-resistant to 200m, Easy grip, screw-in crown, double security folding clasp, sapphire crystal.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: 1/10th second chronograph
features.description:
In 1975, TAG Heuer introduced the world's first quartz chronograph. Today, the company is still at the cutting edge of timing technology and produces quartz chronographs that offer highly accurate time measurement, while remaining easy to use.



FUNCTIONS OF THE 1/10TH SEC. CHRONOGRAPHS

The 1/10th sec. quartz chronographs can measure up to 10 hours of elapsed time to within 1/10th of a second. They have the following basic functions:



 Simple time measurement

 Additional time measurement

label:
Full Diamonds
37 mm
productDescription: This is a watch to really make a woman sparkle. Its polished bezel is luxuriously encrusted with 120 top Wesselton diamonds (0.75 carat in total). With its black or white dial, and its steel and ceramic bracelet, it is the perfect feminine combination of strength and elegance.

features.title: Screw-in crown with 'Easy Grip' system and double gaskets
120 diamonds,0.75 CT
features.description:
In its jewelry models, TAG Heuer pays great attention to the criteria that make a diamond unique: its size, color,clarity and weight. Each stone is verified by gemologists before being set by hand using binoculars in strict ac-
cordance with professional standards. The setter first ensures that the diamonds are all identical in size and certifies that the table (the upper face of the stone) is parallel to the base. These principles are essential to
the beauty and the quality of the setting and enable another inspection of the stones. The diamonds are then positioned in the claws machined into the steel or gold,and fixed onto the watch.
TAG Heuer jewelry models all undergo rigorous quality testing. They are immersed in soapy water and subjected to ultrasound waves to ensure that the diamonds will not become accidentally detached.

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label: 41MM
bezel: Unidirectional black titanium carbide coated steel turning
productDescription: Like the colors on a Formula 1 car, the looks of these timepieces are simple and bold. The fine-brushed steel case contrasts with the unidirectional turning bezel, which is coated in black titanium carbide, as is the “easy-grip” crown. The jet-black or white dial is beautifully complemented by hand-applied markers, and by the racing red of our classic TAG Heuer logo. A black rubber strap is an option. White, black, red: the subdued look of the watch is audacious.

label:
Calibre 16
Automatic Chronograph
41 mm
productDescription:
High functionality and masculine styling make this Calibre 16 Automatic Chronograph a necessity for all lovers of motor racing. A high-tech Calibre 16 automatic movement powers the chronograph functions like central seconds, plus minutes and hours. A small seconds counter is positioned at 9 o'clock and a date feature at 3 o'clock.

An open flange design allows for easy readability of seconds. A tachymeter scale on the bezel gives average speed measurement.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Three counters for running seconds, chrono minutes, hours
Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

productDescription: Like the colors on a Formula 1 car, the looks of these timepieces are simple and bold. The fine-brushed steel case contrasts with the unidirectional turning bezel, which is coated in black titanium carbide, as is the “easy-grip” crown. movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Calibre 16
Automatic Chronograph
41 mm
productDescription:
High functionality and masculine styling make this Calibre 16 Automatic Chronograph a necessity for all lovers of motor racing. A high-tech Calibre 16 automatic movement powers the chronograph functions like central seconds, plus minutes and hours. A small seconds counter is positioned at 9 o'clock and a date feature at 3 o'clock.

An open flange design allows for easy readability of seconds. A tachymeter scale on the bezel gives average speed measurement.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Three counters for running seconds, chrono minutes, hours
Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Crown stamped with the TAG Heuer logo
Screw-in caseback with a specific FANGIO decoration

label:
Calibre 16
Automatic Chronograph
41 mm
productDescription:
High functionality and masculine styling make this Calibre 16 Automatic Chronograph a necessity for all lovers of motor racing. A high-tech Calibre 16 automatic movement powers the chronograph functions like central seconds, plus minutes and hours. A small seconds counter is positioned at 9 o'clock and a date feature at 3 o'clock.

An open flange design allows for easy readability of seconds. A tachymeter scale on the bezel gives average speed measurement.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Three counters for running seconds, chrono minutes, hours
Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Sapphire crystal caseback
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Luminescent markers on hour and minute hands

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Steel, Ceramic and diamonds
37 mm
bezel: 84 diamonds (0.47 ct), polished steel / black ceramic
strap: Polished steel / black ceramic, butterfly folding clasp
productDescription:
A bold yet feminine 37mm case circumference in polished stainless steel supports the signature Formula 1 bezel that sets 84 Wesselton diamonds. The 12 deep black high quality ceramic inserts underline the sparkles by contrast, making the watch reminiscent of a dazzling flower. Its gorgeously feminine and smooth bracelet, an eye-catching combination of deep black ceramic and polished stainless steel, is held secure by the stainless steel butterfly folding clasp  designed to be effortlessly opened and closed for women on-the-go.



Dial heart is replete with 54 glittering Wesselton diamonds and surrounded by 10 stones used as hour markers, a date window at 3 oclock and TAG Heuer three dimensional monochromatic logo at 12 oclock. Each and every single one of these diamonds has been set with 4 stainless steel beads closed by hand. Polishing each jeweled part of this timepiece requires the highest level of expertise to give the setting the utmost level of shine without loosening the stones.



Overall carat of this jewelled TAG Heuer Formula 1 Lady Steel and Ceramic Pavée reaches a sizzling 0.65ct.

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Luminescent markers on hour and minute hands
Polished steel and ceramic fixed bezel

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Steel and Ceramic Diamonds
37 MM
strap: Polished steel / white ceramic. Butterfly folding clasp
productDescription: This new model combines the best of both worlds: steel — ceramic; reliable — chic; masculine — feminine. Both versions have sporty steel bezels with ceramic inlay; sapphire glass; and 200m water-resistance.

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Screw-in crown with 'Easy Grip' system and double gaskets
60 diamonds,0.35 CT
features.description:
In its jewelry models, TAG Heuer pays great attention to the criteria that make a diamond unique: its size, color,clarity and weight. Each stone is verified by gemologists before being set by hand using binoculars in strict ac-
cordance with professional standards. The setter first ensures that the diamonds are all identical in size and certifies that the table (the upper face of the stone) is parallel to the base. These principles are essential to
the beauty and the quality of the setting and enable another inspection of the stones. The diamonds are then positioned in the claws machined into the steel or gold,and fixed onto the watch.
TAG Heuer jewelry models all undergo rigorous quality testing. They are immersed in soapy water and subjected to ultrasound waves to ensure that the diamonds will not become accidentally detached.

TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
24 Calibre 36
Automatic Chronograph
40.5 mm
strap: “Soft touch” blue alligator strap with blue stitching
dial: Blue dial with vertical grey stripes
productDescription:
With its motor racing-inspired design, this chronograph puts the spirit of “Le Mans” on your wrist and re-interprets the legendary blue dial Steve McQueen wore in the “Le Mans” movie.

The “Advanced Dynamic Absorber” system protects the movement against jolts and vibrations.

The unique, wide open sapphire case back shows the exceptional oscillating mass resembling a racing wheel and the famous C.O.S.C. Calibre 36 beating at 36,000 beats per hour.

As a finishing touch, the oversized “24” at 12 pays tribute to “Le Mans”.

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: C.O.S.C chronometer
features.description:
Each model that is officially certified as a chronometer
is given a booklet and a C.O.S.C. card by TAG Heuer. The
individual number printed on the card corresponds to
the number engraved on the movement certified by the Official Swiss Chronometer Control.
Each of these movements is a unique object that has been
produced with the greatest possible care and is an authentic
masterpiece of watchmaking.
The C.O.S.C. Chronometer Certificate: a sign of very high precision and
quality.

Fine-brushed blue dial with vertical grey stripes, bearing an oversized "24" at 12 o'clock
Two blue semi sub-counters at 3 and 9 o’clock indicating respectively the chronograph minute and the small second
Sapphire case back and “MONACO Twenty Four” inscription
Polished steel crown with blue line at 3

productDescription: A striking new tribute to the Automobile Club de Monaco. Finally the Monaco legend comes back in black. This new Monaco Calibre 12 chronograph is totally uncompromising. The smoked sapphire caseback proudly displays the ACM logo. An instant icon.

TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

label:
Calibre 12 LS
Automatic Chronograph
40.5 mm
productDescription: A Calibre 12 Automatic Chronograph which takes the iconic design of the Monaco and reinvents it for the 21st Century. Based on the radically new and award-winning design of the Monaco V4, the Monaco Calibre 12 LS Chronograph has an innovative Linear System. The LS shows current second with a horizontal display at 3 o'clock. Add another linear display indicating the date, and the unique design of the chrono counters, and you have an avant-garde chronograph to take into the next millenium.

This new Calibre 72 model colours in those crucial minutes till the race starts, using the Countdown function to display 5, 10 or 15 minutes before the starting line. The ultimate sailing timepiece.

44 mm

productDescription:
This sporty chronograph epitomizes the excitement of diving.

Specific features make it practical to wear and easy-to-use even in deep water conditions: 500m water-resistance, the magnified lens over the date, the grips on the bezel. Just as thrilling is the design. Luminescent markers, and subtle highlights on the chronograph counters, add to the impact of the look.

The essential instrument for people who relish an underwater challenge.

features.title: Water resistant to 300m: a proof of ultimate resistance
Chronograph accurate to 1/10th of a second
features.description:
In 1975, TAG Heuer introduced the world's first quartz chronograph. Today, the company is still at the cutting edge of timing technology and produces quartz chronographs that offer highly accurate time measurement, while remaining easy to use.

FUNCTIONS OF THE 1/10TH SEC. CHRONOGRAPHS
The 1/10th sec. quartz chronographs can measure up to 12 hours of elapsed time to within 1/10th of a second. They have the following basic functions:

• Simple time measurement
• Additional time measurement

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Counters for split seconds, minutes, hours, small seconds
Oversize screw in crown with double gaskets
Fine-brushed steel case with a diameter of 43 mm

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Chronograph
42 mm
bezel: Polished steel and brushed black ceramic
productDescription: Engineered with Vodafone McLaren Mercedes and tested in racing conditions by Jenson Button, each timepiece comes equipped with the TAG Heuer six key features: 1/10th of a second display, water-resistant to 200m, Easy grip, screw-in crown, double security folding clasp, sapphire crystal.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: 1/10th second chronograph
features.description:
In 1975, TAG Heuer introduced the world's first quartz chronograph. Today, the company is still at the cutting edge of timing technology and produces quartz chronographs that offer highly accurate time measurement, while remaining easy to use.



FUNCTIONS OF THE 1/10TH SEC. CHRONOGRAPHS

The 1/10th sec. quartz chronographs can measure up to 10 hours of elapsed time to within 1/10th of a second. They have the following basic functions:



 Simple time measurement

 Additional time measurement

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Curved & polished hand-applied indexes and 12 numeral with luminescent markers
Dial
features.description:
• Anthracite with “sunray” effect dial
  • 3 black counters with “azurage”:
    • 1/10th of a second and hour chronograph counter at 6 o’clock
    • Minute chronograph counter at 9 o’clock
    • Running second counter at 3 o’clock
  • Curved and polished hand-applied indexes and “12” numeral with luminescent markers
  • Polished minute and hour hands with luminescent markers
  • Polished counters’ hands
  • Polished chronograph central second hand
  • “TAG HEUER FORMULA 1” lettering
  • Printed minuterie on the dial
  • Angled date window at 4 o’clock

features.title: Case
features.description:
• Case diameter: 42 mm
  • Black titanium carbide coated steel case
  • Black titanium carbide coated steel fixed bezel with:
    • Black aluminium ring
  • Sapphire crystal
  • Black titanium carbide coated steel “Easy Grip” screw-in crown with raised fine- brushed TAG Heuer shield
  • Black titanium carbide coated steel crown protectors and push-buttons
  • Circular fine-brushed screw-in caseback with special checkered decoration
  • Water-resistance: 200 meters

features.title: Bracelet
features.description: • Fine-brushed steel folding clasp

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
"Indy 500"
Chronograph
42 mm
productDescription: The Indy 500 Chronograph celebrates TAG Heuers role as official timekeeper and partner to the worlds most thrilling race. Its black engraved tachymetre scale proudly displays the motto INDY 500 in racing red. Red too is the chronograph hand, ticking off 1/10th of a second. And theres another very special touch. The case back is beautifully engraved with a brick pattern, paying homage to the bricks of the Indy 500 finishing line.

label:
GRANDE DATE
42mm
bezel: Steel coated with black titanium carbide
productDescription:
These models radiate all the excitement of F1 racing. Flanges on watch and chronograph display the racing red* of McLaren, our Formula 1 partner. And the same fiery red contrasts with white on the chronograph counters to make them superbly readable. The black titanium carbide-coated bezel* is an essential speed-measuring tool.

The watchs small second counter is embellished with a spiral effect,

highlighting the Grande Date window at 6.

label:
Calibre 36 RS Caliper
Automatic Chronograph
43 mm
productDescription:
The Grand Carrera Calibre 36 RS Caliper Automatic Chronograph is the world's first mechanical chronograph which measures and displays time to 1/10th of a second. The unequalled Caliper Rotating Scale magnifies the 1/10th second scale for at-a-glance readings.

The C.O.S.C. certified movement oscillates at an astonishing 36,000 vibrations per hour. This enables the central seconds hand to count 1/10th of a second intervals.

Inspired by GT race car engine design, the breakthrough Grand Carrera Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance.

features.title: Calibre 36 RS automatic chronograph
features.description: The C.O.S.C. certified movement oscillates at an astonishing 36,000 vibrations per hour. This enables the central seconds hand to count 1/10th of a second intervals. It is the first mechanical chronograph in the world to achieve this.

features.title: Anti-scratch sapphire crystal with double anti-reflection treatment
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is
cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been
created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Polished faceted hands and indexes are hand applied and coated with luminescent material
Safety push-button on the bracelet or strap
C.O.S.C chronometer
features.description:
Each model that is officially certified as a chronometer
is given a booklet and a C.O.S.C. card by TAG Heuer. The
individual number printed on the card corresponds to
the number engraved on the movement certified by the Official Swiss Chronometer Control.
Each of these movements is a unique object that has been
produced with the greatest possible care and is an authentic
masterpiece of watchmaking.
The C.O.S.C. Chronometer Certificate: a sign of very high precision and
quality.

movementDetails.description:
Automatic calibre. Diameter: 30 mm (13''') —31 rubies.
Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 36.000 vibrations per hour (5 Hz).
Power reserve: about 50 hours.
CERTIFICATION
C.O.S.C. Certified Chronograph.

The Grand Carrera Calibre 36 RS Caliper Automatic Chronograph is the world's first mechanical chronograph which measures and displays time to 1/10th of a second. The unequalled Caliper Rotating Scale magnifies the 1/10th second scale for at-a-glance readings.

The C.O.S.C. certified movement oscillates at an astonishing 36,000 vibrations per hour. This enables the central seconds hand to count 1/10th of a second intervals.

Inspired by GT race car engine design, the breakthrough Grand Carrera Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance.

features.title: Calibre 36 RS automatic chronograph
features.description: The C.O.S.C. certified movement oscillates at an astonishing 36,000 vibrations per hour. This enables the central seconds hand to count 1/10th of a second intervals. It is the first mechanical chronograph in the world to achieve this.

features.title: Anti-scratch sapphire crystal with double anti-reflection treatment
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is
cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been
created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Polished faceted hands and indexes are hand applied and coated with luminescent material
Safety push-button on the bracelet or strap
C.O.S.C chronometer
features.description:
Each model that is officially certified as a chronometer
is given a booklet and a C.O.S.C. card by TAG Heuer. The
individual number printed on the card corresponds to
the number engraved on the movement certified by the Official Swiss Chronometer Control.
Each of these movements is a unique object that has been
produced with the greatest possible care and is an authentic
masterpiece of watchmaking.
The C.O.S.C. Chronometer Certificate: a sign of very high precision and
quality.

movementDetails.label: Calibre 36 RS
movementDetails.description:
Automatic calibre. Diameter: 30 mm (13''') —31 rubies.
Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 36.000 vibrations per hour (5 Hz).
Power reserve: about 50 hours.
CERTIFICATION
C.O.S.C. Certified Chronograph.
movementDetails.display: Hours — minutes — small seconds at 9. Chronograph minutes at 3 and chronograph hours counter at 6, both displayed by Rotating System.
movementDetails.decoration: Openworked oscillating mass : "Côtes de Genève" engraved "TAG Heuer — Calibre 36 — Chronometer Swiss Made".

label:
Calibre 17 RS2
Automatic Chronograph
43 mm
case: Grade 2 titanium coated with titanium carbide
bezel: Grade 2 titanium coated with titanium carbide
strap: "Soft touch" black alligator red stitching and lining
productDescription:
The sleek black styling and exclusive Rotating System make the Grand Carrera Calibre 17 RS2 Automatic Chronograph a must for connoisseurs of chronographs and motor racing. Inspired by GT race car engine design, the TAG Heuer Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance.

On the Grand CARRERA Calibre 17 RS2 the rotating system shows a permanent seconds hand at 3 o'clock and chrono minutes at 9 o'clock. The date display is at 6 o'clock. This model is in grade 2 titanium coated with titanium carbide. There is a sapphire crystal fitted into the caseback which reveals the movement.

features.title: Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Hand applied curved faceted indexes with double finishing black gold coating

movementDetails.label: Calibre 17 RS
movementDetails.description: TAG Heuer Calibre 17 RS , Swiss Made. Automatic calibre. Diameter: 28.6 mm (12 ½''') — 37 rubies. Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 28,800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz).
Power reserve: about 42 hours.

CERTIFICATION
C.O.S.C. certified chronograph.
movementDetails.display: Hours — minutes — small seconds at 3 o'clock. Chronograph minutes at 9 o'clock displayed by ROTATING SYSTEM. Chronograph central seconds.
movementDetails.decoration: Openworked oscillating mass: "Côtes de Genève" engraved "TAG Heuer — Calibre 17 — Chronometer Swiss Made".

label:
Calibre 17 RS
Automatic Chronograph
43 mm
productDescription: The sleek styling and exclusive Rotating System make the Grand Carrera Calibre 17 RS Automatic Chronograph a must for connoisseurs of chronographs and motor racing. Inspired by GT race car engine design, the TAG Heuer Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance. On the Grand CARRERA Calibre 17 RS chronograph the Rotating Systems show a permanent seconds hand at 3 o?clock and chrono minutes at 9 o?clock. The date display is at 6 o?clock. The Grand CARRERA Calibre 17 Automatic Chronograph comes in a choice of luxury finishings. They all have a sapphire crystal fitted into the caseback which reveals the movement.

features.title: Anti-scratch sapphire crystal with double anti-reflection treatment
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is
cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been
created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Polished faceted hands and indexes are hand applied and coated with luminescent material
Safety push-button on the bracelet or strap
C.O.S.C chronometer
features.description:
Each model that is officially certified as a chronometer
is given a booklet and a C.O.S.C. card by TAG Heuer. The
individual number printed on the card corresponds to
the number engraved on the movement certified by the Official Swiss Chronometer Control.
Each of these movements is a unique object that has been
produced with the greatest possible care and is an authentic
masterpiece of watchmaking.
The C.O.S.C. Chronometer Certificate: a sign of very high precision and
quality.

features.title: Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

label:
Calibre 8 RS Grande Date and GMT
Automatic watch
42,5 mm
productDescription:
Sleek design and the unique TAG Heuer Rotating System come together in the Grand CARRERA Calibre 8 RS Automatic. Inspired by GT race car engine design, the breakthrough Grand CARRERA Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance.

On the Grand CARRERA Calibre 8 the Rotating System reveals a second time zone at 6. An oversized date window is positioned at 12. The Grand CARRERA Calibre 8 comes in a variety of luxury dials and bracelets. They all have a sapphire crystal fitted into the caseback which reveals the movement.

label:
Calibre 6 RS
Automatic Watch
40,2 mm
productDescription:
Sleek design and the unique TAG Heuer Rotating System come together in the Grand CARRERA Calibre 6 RS Automatic. Inspired by GT race car engine design, the breakthrough Grand CARRERA Rotating System replaces traditional hands with dashboard style discs: the readability is optimum while maintaining effortless elegance.

On the Grand CARRERA Calibre 6 the Rotating System moves behind the permanent second hand. A date window is positioned at 3 o'clock. These models have a sapphire crystal fitted into the caseback with 6 screws that reveals the movement.

label:
Grande date
diamond dial
37 mm
productDescription: A lady's diamond Monaco with Wesselton diamonds on the dial. It comes in several models each with ultra elegant finishing.

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Crown design is faithful to legendary original series
13 diamonds (0.081 CT)
features.description:
In its jewelry models, TAG Heuer pays great attention to the criteria that make a diamond unique: its size, color,clarity and weight. Each stone is verified by gemologists before being set by hand using binoculars in strict accordance with professional standards. The setter first ensures that the diamonds are all identical in size and certifies that the table (the upper face of the stone) is parallel to the base. These principles are essential to the beauty and the quality of the setting and enable another inspection of the stones. The diamonds are then positioned in the claws machined into the steel or gold,and fixed onto the watch.
TAG Heuer jewelry models all undergo rigorous quality testing. They are immersed in soapy water and subjected to ultrasound waves to ensure that the diamonds will not become accidentally detached.

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Calibre 1887
Automatic Chronograph
43 MM
productDescription: Powered by the in-house Calibre 1887 movement and inspired by the Calibre 16 design, this is a classic reborn. Ultraresistant ceramic on the bezel and unscratchable sapphire on the caseback protect a 43mm case of polished steel. The pulse-quickening dial comes in understated black or elegant anthracite with a sunray effect, and a new H-shaped bracelet adds a special touch of style. An even more sporty option is offered by a version with its sandblasted titanium Grade 2 case, coated in black titanium carbide, and the black alligator strap with a “soft touch” effect with elegant stitching and lining in vibrant racing red.

label:
Calibre 16 Day Date
Automatic Chronograph
43 MM
productDescription: High functionality and masculine styling make this Calibre 16 Automatic Chronograph a necessity for all lovers of motor racing. A stylish day and date function is positioned at 3 o'clock. A high-tech Calibre 16 automatic movement powers the chronograph functions like central seconds, plus minutes and hours. An open flange design with red accents and large numerals allow for easy readability.

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Three original counters for running seconds, chrono minutes, hours
Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Distinctive day and date feature at 3
Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Crown stamped with the TAG Heuer logo

movementDetails.label: Calibre 16 Daydate
movementDetails.description:
TAG Heuer Calibre 16, Swiss Made.
Automatic calibre.
Diameter: 30.4 mm (13 ¼''') — 25 rubies.
Rapid day and date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 28,800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz).
Power reserve: about 42 hours.
movementDetails.display:
Hours — minutes — small seconds at 9 o'clock.
Chronograph hours — minutes counters.
Central seconds counter. Day and date window.
movementDetails.decoration:
Oscillating mass: "Côtes de Genève", engraved
"TAG Heuer — Calibre 16 — Swiss Made".

43 mm

label:
Calibre 36
Automatic Flyback Chronograph
43mm
productDescription: This spectacular addition to the TAG Heuer Carrera range is doubly special. For the first time, the legendary Calibre 36 movement pulsates inside a Carrera case. And the flyback function makes starting, stopping and resetting the chronograph a child’s play with a single touch of the flyback button. Ultralight sandblasted titanium grade 2, coated with black titanium carbide, gives the case an intense racing look, which the perforated black leather strap enhances. For a more classic styling, there is a polished steel case, complemented by the new H-shaped bracelet in the same materials. The Carrera Calibre 36 Flyback Chronograph. A dazzling newcomer.

label:
Calibre 16 Day Date
Automatic Chronograph
Monaco Grand Prix
43 mm
productDescription:
Glamorous, challenging, world-famous. The Monaco Grand Prix is certainly that, and TAG Heuer is a proud partner.
To celebrate that partnership, this chronograph adds Monaco magic to the Carrera legend. The pulsequickening features of this limited edition include a dynamic black rubber strap, replicating the F1 1964 tyre tread; red “Monaco Grand Prix” lettering on the bezel tachymetre scale; and on the case back, the Monaco Grand Prix logo and your own “Limited Edition” number. Every detail radiates the thrill of top-level motor racing.

label:
CALIBRE 1887
AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH
41mm
productDescription: Performance, craftsmanship, elegance. If you bottled the essence of TAG Heuer Carrera, this chronograph would be it. A fully integrated column-wheel chronograph, it is assembled from 320 components, and includes the famous oscillating pinion patented by Edouard Heuer in 1887. The Calibre 1887 movement vibrates 28,000  times an hour, and produces 50 hours’ power reserve. Absolutely classic. Absolutely Carrera.

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment

label:
Calibre 16 Day Date
Automatic Chronograph
41mm
productDescription: In a class of their own. These racing-inspired day-date chronographs are a brand-new addition to the TAG Heuer Carrera Calibre 16 range. Inside, the engine is the outstanding Calibre 16 movement. Outside, three counters and a tachymeter scale guarantee you perfect chronograph timing in an advanced design, while the day-date function is a pleasure to read. And against your skin is that extra special touch: a case back dedicated to the greatest driver ever, Juan Manuel Fangio. What better way to be part of TAG Heuer’s conquest of speed?

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Tachymeter scale on bezel
features.description: The tachymeter indicates the average speed of a car, for example, by measuring the time taken to cover a given distance (a kilometer or a mile).

features.title: Three counters for running seconds, chrono minutes, hours
Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Screw-in caseback with a specific FANGIO decoration
Crown stamped with the TAG Heuer logo

movementDetails.label: Calibre 16 Daydate
movementDetails.description:
TAG Heuer Calibre 16, Swiss Made.
Automatic calibre.
Diameter: 30.4 mm (13 ¼''') — 25 rubies.
Rapid day and date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 28,800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz).
Power reserve: about 42 hours.
movementDetails.display:
Hours — minutes — small seconds at 9 o'clock.
Chronograph hours — minutes counters.
Central seconds counter. Day and date window.
movementDetails.decoration:
Oscillating mass: "Côtes de Genève", engraved
"TAG Heuer — Calibre 16 — Swiss Made".

label:
Calibre 1887 Heritage
Automatic Chronograph
41mm
productDescription: Heritage and innovation synchronize powerfully in these TAG Heuer Carrera chronographs. A tribute to TAG Heuer’s noble watchmaking tradition, they are powered by the in-house Calibre 1887 movement. Design history comes back to life in every last detail. The beautifully engraved and lacquered dial and the bold Arabic numerals in a nostalgic font create a look that is luxurious heritage with a twist. Always a talking point. TAG Heuer Carrera Heritage.

movementDetails.performance: Balance frequency: 28.800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz). Power reserve: about 50 hours, about 40 hours when the chronograph is engaging.
movementDetails.display: Hours — minutes — small seconds at 9. Chronograph minutes at 12 and chronograph hours at 6. Date at 6.
movementDetails.decoration: Oscillating mass: 'Côtes de Genève' engraved 'TAG Heuer — Calibre 1887 Swiss Made'.

label:
Calibre 16 Heritage
Automatic Chronograph
41 mm
productDescription:
TAG Heuer has a history of evolutionizing timepiece technology with unequalled famous inventions.

The Carrera Heritage Calibre 16 Chronograph extends the particularity of the Carrera collection, first launched in 1964. Its embossed counters at 12 and 6 are enriched with a spiral effect, and it comes with a choice of steel bracelet; blue, black or brown alligator strap.

features.title: Embossed chronograph counters with azurage at 12 and 6
Double anti-reflective treatment

label:
Calibre 8 GMT and Grande Date
Automatic watch
41 mm
productDescription: Travel in two time zones. The new TAG Heuer Carrera timepiece equipped with the GMT function and a Grande Date is superbly readable. The case in polished steel can be paired with the prestigious H-shaped bracelet or with an alligator strap in black, anthracite, or brown. A must-have for all travellers.

features.title: Safety push-button on the bracelet or strap
C.O.S.C chronometer
features.description:
Each model that is officially certified as a chronometer
is given a booklet and a C.O.S.C. card by TAG Heuer. The
individual number printed on the card corresponds to
the number engraved on the movement certified by the Official Swiss Chronometer Control.
Each of these movements is a unique object that has been
produced with the greatest possible care and is an authentic
masterpiece of watchmaking.
The C.O.S.C. Chronometer Certificate: a sign of very high precision and
quality.

features.title: Sapphire crystal caseback
features.description:
All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina.
Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Polished and faceted hour and minutes hands, with white luminescent markers

movementDetails.label: Calibre 8
movementDetails.description:
TAG Heuer Calibre 8. Swiss Made.

Automatic calibre.

Diameter: 26.20 mm (11 ½'''), — 21 rubies.

Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 28,800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz).

Power reserve: about 42 hours.



CERTIFICATION

C.O.S.C. certified automatic watch.
movementDetails.display:

Grande date.

Second time zone displayed by hours and minutes at 6 o’clock.
movementDetails.decoration: Oscillating mass: “Côtes de Genève”, engraved “TAG Heuer — Calibre 8 — Chronometer Swiss Made”.
