label:
Calibre 6 Heritage
Automatic Watch
39 mm
productDescription: The Carrera Heritage Calibre 6 timepiece is the perfect expression of TAG Heuers 150 years watchmaking heritage, and echoes the refined elegance of a bygone era. The dial is a work of art with its stunning traditional flinqué texture. The dial is further enhanced by the sophisticated spiral effect on the seconds counter, and the polished hands and numerals.

label:
Calibre 16
Automatic Chronograph
43 mm
productDescription:
Water-resistant to 100m, the Link Calibre 16 Chronograph is a serious timepiece for serious businessmen.

Its features include: the new cushion and round shape bezel with tachymetre scale; scratch-resistant sapphire crystal with double anti-reflective treatment; a screwfitting case back with engraved decoration.

It is available in 2 dial versions: black or silver.

features.title: Double anti-reflective treatment
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Automatic chronograph movement
features.description:
TAG Heuer Automatic chronographs make it possible

to measure times with an accuracy

of 1/8th of a second. They are all fitted with very high-

frequency Swiss movements and represent one of the

great achievements in the long watchmaking tradition

and history of the company.



AUTOMATIC CHRONOGRAPH FUNCTIONS

The principal characteristics of TAG Heuer automatic

chronographs are reliability, simplicity of use and a

highly legible display. They have a number of useful

functions for professional and leisure sporting activi-

ties, as well as for everyday use:



— Simple time measurement

— Additional time measurement

features.title: Hand-applied curved, faceted and polished indexes
Screw in crown with double gaskets
Hand applied monochrome TAG Heuer logo

movementDetails.description:

movementDetails.performance:

Power reserve: about 42 hours.
movementDetails.display:

productDescription: This year TAG Heuer takes the Link in a new direction. By rethinking every contour of the Link case we have launched the supremely elegant Calibre 18 Chronograph. movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

ROMAN NUMERAL BEZEL
34.5 MM
productDescription: Some women go to the heart of the matter : powder rose, iridescent white mother-of-pearl dial with 11 diamonds to mark the hours set off by the polished stainless steel of the bracelet and case for their full effect. And the effect is there.

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Polished and faceted hour and minutes hands, with white luminescent markers
12 engraved and lacquered Roman Numerals on the bezel

movementDetails.label: Calibre 7
movementDetails.description:
TAG Heuer Calibre 7, Swiss Made.

Automatic calibre.

Diameter: 26.2 mm (11 1/2''') — 21 to 25 rubies depending on the execution.

Rapid date correction.
movementDetails.performance:
Balance frequency: 28,800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz).

Power reserve: about 42 to 46 hours depending on the execution.
movementDetails.display:
Hours — minutes — second.

Date window.
movementDetails.decoration: Oscillating mass: "Côtes de Genève", engraved "TAG Heuer — Calibre 7 — Swiss Made".

productDescription: As an elegant and timeless piece of jewelry, the new Link Lady can be worn on any occasion.

features.title: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
features.description: All our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal. This is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire that has been created by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. Sapphire is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it.

features.title: Polished and faceted 18K 3N plated hour and minutes hands, with white SLN
Date window at 6 o’clock with 3N colored frame
Fixed bezel capped with solid 18K 3N Yellow Gold

movementDetails.label: Quartz movement
movementDetails.description:
A QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A quartz movement is powered by a battery. Its regulator (time-measuring device) is a quartz crystal. An electrical current causes the crystal to vibrate very consistently and at a very high frequency (32,768 times per second). This gives the movement almost perfect precision (a variation of only a few seconds per month.)
movementDetails.performance:
TAG HEUER QUARTZ MOVEMENTS

Quartz movements used by TAG Heuer are some of the most reliable and accurate made in Switzerland. They are also distinguished by excellent resistance to shocks and magnetic fields.
movementDetails.display:
TAG HEUER BATTERIES

The batteries for TAG Heuer quartz movements have a service life of at least two years.
movementDetails.decoration:
END-OF-LIFE INDICATOR

For increased security, all TAG Heuer quartz watches(except chronographs) are ?tted with an end of battery life indicator (EOL). When the battery shows signs of weakening, the seconds hand starts making four-second jumps every four seconds. However, the movement continues to display the exact time until the battery is exhausted.

label:
Roman Numeral dial
29 mm
productDescription: In its simplest version – the hours marked by roman numerals on a white guilloche background – the Link Lady is  effortlessly stylish: after all, a beautiful figure looks good in everything, straight-cut or flared, flatties or heels. In the end, beautiful curves, subtle harmony and natural grace are the only things that matter
